sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './../shared/tour-details.css' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} =useParams() //static data const tour = tourData.find(tour=>tour.id===id) //destructure properties from tour object const {photo,title,desc,price,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize}=tour; const{totalRating,avgRating}=calculateAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating}{totalRating===0 ?( "Not Rated" ):( ({reviews?.length}))} {adress}
) } export default TourDetails
